amendment.description: To increase funding for the removal of trees that have been adversely affected by the emerald ash borer, with offsets.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2121 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2121 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S14142-14143; text: CR S14142) To increase funding for the removal of trees that have been adversely affected by the emerald ash borer, with offsets.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2121 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2121 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Levin.
